short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows estimated read time for every webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A neat, clean, and simple tool to help you estimate your read time of every webpage effortlessly! Your estimated read time will show in a small text box at the bottom right of the page in a non-disruptive manner!
